# Lemon Squeezy Events - Enhanced Navigation Website

A complete website redesign with significantly improved navigation and user experience for the team-building company.

## Project Type
Static responsive website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

## Navigation Enhancements Implemented
✅ Mobile-first responsive design with hamburger menu
✅ Sticky navigation bar with scroll progress indicator  
✅ Breadcrumb navigation for better page orientation
✅ Smooth scrolling between sections and pages
✅ Dropdown menus for organized service categories
✅ Back-to-top button with smart visibility
✅ Search functionality in FAQ section
✅ Accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
✅ Form validation and user feedback
✅ Multi-page structure replacing single long page

## Site Structure
- **index.html** - Homepage with hero, services, and process
- **about.html** - Sophie's story, qualifications, and values  
- **contact.html** - Contact form with multiple options
- **faq.html** - Searchable FAQ with category filtering
- **blog.html** - Team building insights and articles
- **css/styles.css** - Comprehensive responsive styling
- **js/navigation.js** - Advanced navigation functionality
- **js/faq.js** - Interactive FAQ features

## Key Features
- Responsive design that works on all devices
- Professional color scheme with lemon/yellow branding
- Smooth animations and hover effects
- Contact forms with validation
- Social media integration
- SEO-optimized structure
- Fast loading performance

## Development
Run local server: `python -m http.server 8080`
View at: http://localhost:8080

This implementation addresses all the navigation issues found on the original website and provides a modern, user-friendly experience.
